REsults for Running serially for r=2


[~/ws/CSCI-5451/git/Radix-sort]vijay094 >> make o 
rm -f rs_openmp
gcc -o rs_openmp rs_openmp.c -lm  -g -Wfatal-errors -Werror -march=native -ffast-math -fopenmp
